project.name: Filmly Movie Review App
project.description: A movie discovery app built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. It features a sleek dark theme with golden accents, user profiles, and comprehensive movie details, focusing on a mobile-first responsive design and enhanced user experience.

layout.baseLayout: Dark theme with rounded corners on all cards and elements. Content centered with padding.
layout.navigation: Bottom tab navigation for main screens (Home, Search, Profile). Top search bar on Home screen.

components.cards: Movie posters with rounded corners, overlay text, and ratings badges.
components.buttons: Golden yellow login button with hover effects, icons for action buttons (Log, Review, List) with rounded borders.

features: Detailed movie pages with cast and ratings
Sort and filter movies by genre, year, rating

screens.name: Login Screen
screens.description: A clean login card overlaid on a movie poster background. The card has rounded corners, a 'Your movie journey awaits' tagline, and simple username/password inputs.

components.name: AuthCard
components.description: A card with a semi-transparent dark background, rounded corners, and a title.

components.name: InputFields
components.description: Username and password input fields with golden borders on focus.

components.name: LoginButton
components.description: A full-width button with a solid golden yellow background and white text.

screens.name: Home Screen
screens.description: The main dashboard with a top search bar, and horizontal scrollable sections for 'Popular' and 'For You' movies. A fixed bottom navigation bar is present.

components.name: BottomNavigation
components.description: A fixed bottom navigation bar with icons for Home, Search, and Profile. The active icon is golden.

components.name: SearchBar
components.description: A top search bar with a search icon and 'Filter & sort' options.

components.name: HorizontalMovieSection
components.description: A horizontally scrollable container displaying MovieCard components with titles like 'Popular' and 'For You'.

components.name: MovieCard
components.description: A component displaying a movie poster with a title, rating, and year overlayed on it.

screens.name: Movie Detail Screen
screens.description: A detailed page for a specific movie. It features a large poster at the top, followed by sections for movie information, plot synopsis, ratings badges, action buttons, and a cast list.

components.name: MovieHeader
components.description: Displays the movie poster, title, year, duration, and director.

components.name: SynopsisSection
components.description: Contains the movie's plot with an option to expand the text.

components.name: RatingBadges
components.description: Small badges for IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings, with a yellow background.

components.name: ActionButtons
components.description: A set of buttons (Log, Review, List) with rounded corners and icons.

components.name: CastSection
components.description: A horizontally scrollable list of actor photos with their names and roles.

screens.name: Profile Screen
screens.description: A user profile page with an avatar, name, and bio. It includes a social media link (Instagram) and displays 'Top 3' favorite movies and a 'Recent Watched' movie grid.

components.name: UserProfileHeader
components.description: Displays the user's avatar, name, bio, and social media links.

components.name: FavoriteMoviesSection
components.description: A section displaying the user's 'Top 3' favorite movies using MovieCard components.

components.name: RecentlyWatchedSection
components.description: A grid or horizontal list displaying the user's recently watched movies.
